name: Classroom Scramble
description:
This was my very first attempt at a weekend game jam!

The theme was "Back to school" and the limitation was "Two Inputs"

I decided to create a simple point and click puzzle game, you need to select each student and organise their path, telling them to walk, turn, wait, and get to their desk in 16 moves or less.

Each level get's progressively more difficult, but it shouldn't pose too much of a challenge. It can be completed in 5 - 30 minutes (depending on how good you are at puzzles).

If enough people like the concept, I'll happily add more levels and features. (such as different types of students with unique behaviours, like taking turns twice as fast, or 'dunce' students that have to sit in a specific desk, just to mix up the possibilities a little bit)

Hope you enjoy it!
